titleStmt.title: Merlini liberati errata: or, The prophecies and predictions of John Partridge, for the year of our Lord, 1690, &c. With useful annotations on them. Together with an epistle touching his respect to those glorious martyrs of the people, King Charles I. and Arch-Bishop Laud. By an earnest honourer of his King and country, and faithful votary to a true astrology. December 31. 1692. Imprimatur, Edmund Bohun.
titleStmt.author: Earnest honourer of his King and country.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for G.C. at the Blew-Ball in Thames-street,

notesStmt.note: Advertisement on verso of final leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
